title: 84/153/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 March 1984 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (Region of Molise) pursuant to Council Directives 72/159/EEC, 72/160/EEC, 72/161/EEC and 75/268/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 March 1984
on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (Region of Molise) pursuant to Council Directives 72/159/EEC, 72/160/EEC, 72/161/EEC and 75/268/EEC
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(84/153/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Law No 16 of the Region of Molise of 4 July 1978 laying down provisions for the implementation of Community Directives on the modernization of farms and Law No 15 of 7 July 1982 amending Law No 16 of 4 July 1978, having regard to the existing Italian provisions implementing Directives 72/159/EEC, 72/160/EEC, 72/161/EEC and 75/268/EEC, satisfy the conditions for a financial contribution by the Community to the common measures referred to in these Directives.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 March 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
